typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (year as integer, genres as string[], rating as integer, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> moviesCosmos
moviesCosmos alterRow(deleteIf(titlekey=='Social Network, The')) ~> DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/titlekey'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
